name: Telegram Virtual Number Shop Bot
description: A Telegram bot for selling virtual numbers with balance, stock, and admin controls — safe and compliant version (no OTP interception).

MONGODB_URI.description: Your MongoDB connection string (e.g., from MongoDB Atlas)

ADMIN_IDS.description: Comma-separated Telegram user IDs of admins (e.g., 123456789,987654321)

CURRENCY_SYMBOL.description: Currency symbol to show in the bot (default: ₹)

DEFAULT_PRICE.description: Default price per account (used if no per-country pricing)

scripts.postdeploy: python -c 'print("✅ Deployment complete. You can now run the bot!")'
